Even as Tuscon was flexing his wrists and struggling to break his
bonds, Scorponok just watched him, a smile on his face.

As the sound of Tuscon's bond breaking could be heard, Scorponok
casually reached down to a nearby control panel, and behind them the
security door to the room shut, and from the sound and vibration of
it, the door was fairly heavy and solid.

> " Nothing will make me fold to either one of you. And yes, I'm not done fighting yet if that's what you two think. So before you make snap judgements of me, I caution you two to not judge a bot by his frame."
>
> His backup energy supply kicks in giving him just enough energy to transform into SUV mode. He starts up his engine and waits for his enemie's reaction.

Scorponok laughed as Tuscon revved his engine. "You forget Scraplet, I
scanned you carefully before you got here. You barely have the energon
reserves to transform, never mind fight us!"

Scorponok's shoulder-mounted cannons oriented themselves on Tuscon,
"But if you want to do this the hard . . . I mean . . .  FUN way, then
I will be all all means oblige you!" Even as he finished speaking
Scoropnok's shoulder cannons began firing bursts of energy at Tuscon!

(Tag)

Preston
(Scorponok)
